benefit.title: Subscription Benefits
benefit.description: Enjoy the following benefits with any subscription plan

1.title: Flexible Payment
1.description: No long-term commitment. Choose monthly or yearly payments, cancel anytime.

2.title: Timely Support
2.description: Get support whenever you need it, helping you overcome difficult moments in your quit smoking journey.

3.title: Science-Based
3.description: Methods and tools developed based on scientific research on addiction and behavior change.

4.title: Data Security
4.description: Your personal information and health data are protected according to the highest security standards.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about subscription plans

features.title: Detailed Comparison
features.description: See the differences between free and paid versions

cta.heading: Ready to start your quit smoking journey?
cta.description: Choose the subscription plan that suits you and begin your journey towards a healthier, smoke-free life.

header.title: Choose the Right Plan for Your Quit Journey
header.description: From free to premium plans with advanced features, we offer solutions for everyone on their journey to quit smoking
